

<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.feature -->

# ```js handleInputAttributes ```


Add some events on some DOM Elements. Here's the list:
*input/textarea**: `onenter`, `onescape`


### Example (js)

```js
import '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/feature/inputAdditionalEvents'
```
